detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor.isClaimed(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#137-143) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- claimedWordIndex = index / 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#138)
	- claimedBitIndex = index % 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#139)
	- mask = (1 << claimedBitIndex) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#141)
	- claimedWord & mask == mask (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#142)

detectors.description:
MerkleDistributor.constructor(address,bytes32).token_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#131) lacks a zero-check on :
		- token = token_ (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#132)

Reentrancy in MerkleDistributor.claim(uint256,address,uint256,bytes32[],uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#151-166):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(token).transfer(account,amount - tip),MerkleDistributor: Transfer failed.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#162)
	- require(bool)(IERC20(token).transfer(deployer,tip)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#163)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Claimed(index,account,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerkleDistributor__9.sol#165)
